name: Don't Get Possessed!
description:
Super Mario meets Phasmophobia!

Help college drop-out Eric to clear out haunted locations while working for Exorcisms and Possessions Inc.

You’ll have to face evil spirits and flying beasts as you try to find the Cursed Objects. But don’t wait too long before you dispose said objects…

Don’t Get Possessed! is a demo game that mixes elements from both Super Mario and Phasmophobia. So put on your overalls, grab your crucifix and go ghost hunting!
